name,

mapper.update:
update sys_config
idx = #{idx,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
val = #{val,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zh_name = #{zhName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_config set idx = #{idx,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, val = #{val,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zh_name = #{zhName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select from sys_config
name like CONCAT(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
order by idx ASC, id ASC
